Text: A big thank you to all the Bunuel uploaders!

Nice one for all this Bunuel we've been getting. 

Anyone have anything by Satyajit Ray? I'm looking for 'Pather Panchali', 'Aparajito' and 'The World of Apu'. Thnx.
Yeah. Tanks a lot, these were great. Any chanses that well will be seeing Los Olvidados???
yes I gonna uppload Los Olvidados soon!

the .sub file contains english subtitles. i converted it to .ssa and used virtualdub to combine the subtitles into the movie BUT these english language subtitles are the worst. my advice if you speak english: stay away from this download. i need to find another tristana that has decent english subtitles.

Look, there are only two Tristana videos. I am not sure which one I downloaded, but I think that it was this one. The download worked perfectly and the A/V quality is good. I speak Spanish and wanted it for that reason but as a matter of comment - the subtitles are a terrible translation. TERRIBLE. Other than that, great download.
just a simple thank for this nice movie
Use this subtitle for Tristana, it's the best I could find for it on the internet: http://subscene.com/english/Tristana/subtitle-103238.aspx
